Upper West Side Fitness Training | Slavik’s VIP Fitness

adrFormatAddress: 2758 Broadway, New York, NY 10025, USA

originalText.text: I have been working out with Slavik at VIP Fitness for 1.5 years.  I admit it took me a few sessions to get used to his training, but once you see the method to his madness you are hooked :) I have worked out with various trainers throughout the years and when there is 10-15 minutes left in the session, they are usually focused on a cool down with an eye on the clock for the next appointment.  Slav has a different approach that allows for his specialized training while going at your own pace.  This doesn't mean that he will let you slack off.  It's quite the opposite!  There have been many days where I would like to wrap it up, but he will have me stay an extra 15-20 minutes to make sure I have completed the full body workout.  Also, you can't beat the prices, especially in this neighborhood!  I highly recommend Slav and the gym, which has a friendly and lowkey environment.

originalText.text: Slavik is a legend. Great positive vibes. The gym is really chill, everyone has their own booth in which to train. I bought 10 sessions and got 5 extra for free, which comes out to $40 per session - unbelievably cheap for this level of service and attention. 5 stars.

text.text: Slavik is a legend. Great positive vibes. The gym is really chill, everyone has their own booth in which to train. I bought 10 sessions and got 5 extra for free, which comes out to $40 per session - unbelievably cheap for this level of service and attention. 5 stars.

originalText.text:
Slavik is an excellent trainer. Your training plan its targeted to your goals. The gym has clients of all ages, I have seen anywhere from teens to adults that look in their mid 80s. I like that each succeeding training session feels slightly more challenging which helps me track my progress.
I have been a member of the gym for 4 months and recommend his business highly to everyone.

originalText.text:
I’ve never used a personal trainer before but I just started at VIP and it is a great experience. I’ve been a runner/ biker for 30 years and thought I was in shape but Slavik is showing me all of the places that I have been neglecting

He is a great guy and has been in the neighborhood for 20+ years. He doesn’t kill you but meets you where you are at and pushes you to do more.

You owe it to your aging, lockdown-weakened body to at least try it. I cannot recommend VIP Fitness highly enough.

originalText.text:
Slavik is amazing. Keeps me motivated and doesn’t letup on me when there are days that I don’t feel good about myself.

Definitely a great spot to start working out a d building yourself up. 10 out of 10 would recommend!
